conditionalFlow.name: Categories({ID})_Products
conditionalFlow.conditions: (proxy.pathsuffix MatchesPath "/Categories({ID})/Products" OR proxy.pathsuffix MatchesPath "/Categories({ID})/Products/**" OR proxy.pathsuffix MatchesPath "/Categories({ID})/Products(**")AND(request.verb = "POST" OR request.verb = "GET")
